headline: Process Improvement | Operations Management | Project Management | Business Analysis | Relationship Management
summary:
10 plus years of extensive project, operations and compliance management experience in private and public sector in banking/finance industry.

	Proven strategic thinker with track record of delivering business impact and results through developing and executing on strategies over both short term and longer term

	Superior presentation and communication (written and verbal), both in articulating his/her ideas and gathering input from key stakeholders

	Demonstrated experience in leading change and making an impact in cross functional groups through influence and strong relationships.

	Strong people leader with demonstrated experience in identifying and growing talent, along with an ability to influence others to impact change.

	Focused in driving operational efficiencies by driving revenue, reducing costs and fixing broken processes.

	Strong time-management and organizational skills to manage multiple deadlines and priorities within a highly demanding environment.

	Proven interpersonal and relationship management skills, and be detail-oriented with the ability to follow up on items or determine appropriate steps for timely resolution.

	Ability to clearly present ideas to project stakeholders and demonstrate superior subject matter expertise to influence management decision making.

	Managed preparation of reports, including executive level reporting, which identify and escalate regulatory concerns issues and events.

	Self-starter, with the ability to deal with ambiguity and develop teams, processes and governance from the ground up.

	Experienced in cross-selling strategy to deepen customer relationships, share of wallet and drive customer engagement.

experiences.title: Analyst
experiences.description: Engaging clients and prospective clients in meaningful discussions to uncover their insurance needs and ensuring optimal coverageConsistently ensuring “Value-Add” interactions with clients to deliver excellent customer experiencePerforming detailed client need assessment to comply with internal and external compliance and regulatory bodiesEffectively managing time to ensure timely client experienceActively supporting business unit initiatives to positively impact three constituents of profit chain.As a system and process subject matter expert providing input to support change activities.Assisting in user testing and supporting the delivery of end user training.Actively participate in Change Champions meetings and events to share and leverage best practices.

recommendations: Sanjiv is full of true leadership qualities and has best nature… he is an excellent person.I have always found him motivating and guiding his employees. Sanjiv, is very down to earth person; it was great pleasure to have leader like him.
